short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your shopping experience with our plugin - your all-in-one loyalty wallet and shopping assistant!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Introducing Cheapskate - The Ultimate Shopping Assistant with a Loyalty Wallet! 🌟

💷 Save money with the ultimate shopping assistant - the first loyalty wallet on a tool! Discover incredible deals, discounts, and exclusive rewards right at your fingertips. Unlock a treasure trove of experiences, gift cards, and jaw-dropping discounts from your favourite brands like Amazon, Lookfantastic, ASOS, and Boots!

👛 Wallet for Loyalty Points and Marketplace for Amazing Rewards
Consolidate all your loyalty points from various retailers in one convenient place. Cheapskate collects your loyalty points from different stores, ensuring you never miss out on valuable rewards!

💸 Instant Deals and Coupons, Just a Click Away
Save big with our powerful algorithm that instantly uncovers the best deals and coupons available. Activate the extension while browsing and watch as the savings pile up.

📜 Wishlist and Price Drop - Sharing Thrifty Fun with Friends
Create your personalised wishlist and share it with friends. Stay one step ahead with our Price Drop feature. Set your desired price, and get alerted when it hits your target.

🎉 Join the revolution and make shopping a thrilling experience while saving a fortune! Follow these steps to get started with Cheapskate:

1️⃣ Click on "Add to Chrome" to install the Cheapskate extension.
2️⃣ Start shopping at your favourite stores and let Cheapskate collect your loyalty points.
3️⃣ Enjoy automatic deals and coupons, making your shopping experience more delightful.
4️⃣ Create a wishlist and share it with your friends to have fun shopping together.
5️⃣ Use the Price Drop feature to stay updated on price reductions and grab the best deals.

By downloading the extension, you agree to the Terms and Conditions and confirm you understand the Cheapskate Privacy Policy.

🌟 Don't miss out on the first loyalty wallet on a shopping assistant tool! Embrace the joy of savings, rewards, and unforgettable experiences today! 🌟
